name: Help Me Obi-Wan Kenobi
Lore: 'Leia sent a hologram plea, ''General Kenobi, years ago you served my father in the Clone Wars. Now he begs you to help him in his struggle against the Empire.''',
Text: 'If Obi-Wan is at a site you control, he may apply any amount of his ability toward drawing a battle destiny at any other location. Ability he uses this way cannot be used again this turn. OR One Rebel may move as a ''react'' to an adjacent battle site.',
